prompts: Create a weather-themed Pokemon that can change its form with the seasons.
Imagine a fluffy creature that resembles a cloud and can control the weather.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of wind and water for a unique look.
Show me a cute Pokemon that has both a stormy and sunny appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a small storm cloud with a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that has a round body and is surrounded by wispy clouds.
Give me a Pokemon that can transform based on the weather conditions around it.

distinctive_features: Round body with a swirling shape
Small eyes and a smiling mouth
